imdb.plot outline: Pio is a very lively teen. He believes that life should be lived to the fullest, and he's not above forcing his philosophy on everyone around him. He's always doing something, and quite often many things at once. Because he's cunning and good at making friends, most of the time he achieves all of his goals. Pio is pushing his peers and teachers to do more. Even if he's a great guy, he's not above tricking everyone, including his friends, if he believes it's for a good cause.
imdb.title: Pio Rocks!
plot: Pio is a very lively teen. He believes that life should be lived to the fullest, and he's not above forcing his philosophy on everyone around him. He's always doing something, and quite often many things at once. Because he's cunning and good at making friends, most of the time he achieves all of his goals. Pio is pushing his peers and teachers to do more. Even if he's a great guy, he's not above tricking everyone, including his friends, if he believes it's for a good cause.
